General.Name: Leader Electronics Inc
General.Description: Leader Electronics Inc. provides power adapters and transformers in Taiwan, Mainland China, the Philippines, the United States, Germany, Malaysia, and internationally. It offers switching power, PoE power, and USB-C chargers; magnets, including transformer/inductor, power conversion, elevators, UPS and inverter, renewable energy, and SMD molded inductor products; power and non-power related OEM products; residential security lighting, side roads, pathway, parking area lighting, commercial security lighting, and street and roadway lighting; and power LED downlight and highbay products for warehouses, big box stores or malls, arenas, stadiums, or gymnasiums, convention centers, churches, aprons or hangars, barns, dry docks, theaters, data centers, exhibition centers or atrium ceilings lights. The company also provides on-board charger, portable charger, DC-DC converter, charging station, DC-AC inverter, brushless DC motor, and energy storage systems. Leader Electronics Inc. was founded in 1970 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 138, Baoqiao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23145
